org.jetel.ctl

Class GraphParametersTLCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.TLCompiler
      • org.jetel.ctl.GraphParametersTLCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITLCompiler

    public class GraphParametersTLCompiler
extends TLCompiler
    A custom TLCompiler that also detects unset required graph parameters.
